summary.para: Adds a font to the set being built, with the caller supplying enough information to search on and determine axis ranges, avoiding the need to open the potentially non-local font.

param.name: fontFile
param.para: Font file reference object to add to the set.

param.name: fontFaceIndex
param.para: The zero-based index of a font face in a collection.

param.name: fontSimulations
param.para: Font face simulation flags for algorithmic emboldening and italicization.

param.name: fontAxisValues
param.para: A pointer to an array containing a list of font axis values. The array should be the size (the number of elements) indicated by the fontAxisValueCount argument.

param.name: fontAxisValueCount
param.para: The number of font axis values contained in the fontAxisValues array.

param.name: properties
param.para: List of properties to associate with the reference.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

remarks.para: The font properties should include at least a family (typographic or weight/style/stretch). Otherwise the font would be accessible in the IDWriteFontSet only by index, not name.

summary.para: Adds references to all the fonts in the specified font file. The method parses the font file to determine the fonts and their properties.

param.name: filePath
param.para: Absolute file path to add to the font set.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

summary.para: Contains methods for building a font set.
